alert.note: Alert for Southern Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 2:03PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SOUTHERN WASHINGTON...EASTERN WINDHAM...WESTERN WINDHAM...AND BENNINGTON COUNTIES... HAZARDS...Snow showers accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one half mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 202 PM EST, snow showers were near Arlington moving east at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Arlington, Townshend, Salem, Manchester, Stratton, Newfane, Manchester Center, West Wardsboro, Windham, Dover, Jamaica, Sunderland, Wardsboro, Grafton, Sandgate, Glastenbury, Wardsboro Center, Cossayuna, Beartown, and Goose City. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow covered roads and deteriorating visibility. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
